forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 48. West wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 33. West wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
In Boston today, the sun hangs high in a dome of tranquil blue, punctuated by wispy clouds that dance lazily along the horizon. The air is brisk, infused with the invigorating bite of a west wind, rustling leaves and beckoning those who appreciate the sharp clarity of a late November day. Such radiant conditions create a canvas that feels almost serene, with the scattered clouds providing just enough texture to make the sky feel alive yet not overwhelming. Tonight, as the sun dips below the skyline, the crispness will deepen, inviting the chill of the evening. 

To embrace this enchanting winter day, one might consider dressing in layers; a warm, lightweight jacket paired with a scarf will offer comfort against the wind’s playful nips. Comfortable shoes are advised for a leisurely stroll along the Charles or through one of the city’s historic neighborhoods, where the autumn foliage clings to the last vestiges of vibrant color. Alternatively, settling into a cozy café with a warm beverage could provide solace from the brisk elements while offering an opportunity to reflect on the beauty of the changing seasons.
